etymology.description: 木(木) (mù, "tree") + 人(人) (rén, "person") + 夂(夂) (zhǐ, "foot") -> person climbing a tree
etymology.interpretation: The character 夌 originally depicted a person (人) climbing or surpassing a tree (木) with a foot added below (夂) to indicate movement upwards or overcoming. The modern form is highly stylized but retains this idea of surpassing or climbing.
